Engage with the world in which you live.
My strongest memory is walking into the meeting.
And in my broken French I said, "Are there any problems?"
And the response was unilaterally, unanimously from these women,...
I feel very strongly that we're all responsible for the state of our world.
Every child deserves a fair start in life.
And some people in the West, they get that for free.
UNICEF are brave enough and bold enough...
...to demand that every child has that opportunity.
